data.message: Did you know that the Mainstream Media lies to all of you, every single day? They actually get paid from the people in power to CONTAIN stories, MANIPULATE facts, and DISINFORM the general public. We've had enough. Join us as we march, nationwide, against the mainstream media. Check out our Facebook page March Against Mainstream Media and join our event page! We, as a nation, will protest outside of Mainstream Media studio headquarters on NOVEMBER 16th! Join us as we TRY to make a DIFFERENCE in our great nation!! JOIN THIS EVENT FOR MORE DETAILS AND EVEN LOCATIONS NEAR YOU! https://www.facebook.com/events/219796878185908/
